title: Wildfire amid record heat wave forces entire village in Canada to evacuate: "The whole town is on fire"
content:
1. Wildfire amid record heat wave forces entire village in Canada to evacuate: "The whole town is on fire"  CBS News
  2. Canada Lytton: Wildfire forces hottest place in heatwave to evacuate  BBC News
  3. An entire Canadian town is up in flames after temperatures soared to a record-breaking 121 degrees Fahrenheit  Yahoo News
  4. Wildfire leads to evacuation order in B.C. village that set Canadian heat wave record  Vancouver Is Awesome
  5. Canadian village ordered to evacuate due to wildfires a day after temperatures topped 121 degrees  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
